about_the_game:
Journey of Reincarnation is
Roguelike + auto battle + NES style retro
It's a combination RPG.

story

The story begins with the protagonist who,
after an unfortunate death,
receives mercy in the heavenly
realm and chooses a new life.

The challenge is a dungeon


Combat is a fully automatic battle with no commands.
Characters think for themselves, choose the best move, and act.

The “key to success” is the customization of status and skills,
which can be controlled by the player through the use of
“Jewel” that are dropped by monsters or purchased at stores.
The formation of the vanguard and rear guard is also important.





Equipment that influences the battle situation "Jewel"


There are three main types of jewels

  • "Armor Gem" related to defense
  • “Weapon Gem” related to attacks
  • "Skill Gem" that determines skills

【Armor Gem】

Make you fight back when attacked by an enemy,
Simply increase your defense,
and some will prevent status abnormalities.

【Weapon Gem】

Those that increase the number of attacks,
Increases attack power,
Those that add abnormalities to normal attacks.

【Skill Gem】

This is attached differently depending on the member's job.

[Swordsmen], who are good at swords,
cannot attach fighting skill gems.
Also, you cannot use magic.

If you are a [Knight], you can also use a spear,
What you are good at changes,
such as being able to use recovery magic.




"Chain bonus" when allies attack continuously!


When an ally's attack hits consecutively,
the "Chain!" and the damage will increase!
Increase the number of chains
by attacking multiple times or stopping the opponent's actions!




When magic is added to the chain, a "CB : Chain Burst" occurs!



Furthermore, if a magic attack hits during the chain,
the normal magic is classed up and a "Chain Burst" occurs!

For example,
[Fire] would be powered up and activated
by another magic called [Explosion]!


Use this to your advantage and do a lot of damage!

Use these systems to your advantage,
repeatedly reincarnate, and conquer the dungeon!

DEMO version


In this DEMO version,
you can experience the process of defeating the very first boss, the Troll.

In addition to experiencing the game system,
the game is balanced to the DEMO version specifications,
so it is more varied and challenging than usual.

There is also a secret boss for those who want to enjoy a challenging battle.

I look forward to your report on the defeat of the secret boss!




For streamers

This game can be streamed without application.
Thank you for the opportunity to share this game with the world!
Also, please include the “game title” in the video title for spoiler consideration.

However, please respond to requests
from game creators and game material copyright holders to delete videos.

(This is a case of lack of consideration that would be offensive
to the producer, and is not intended to restrict content.)



・This game is created using RPG Maker MV.

short_description: 【Reincarnation Roguelike Retro RPG】Battle is fully automatic with no commands! Support the characters who think for themselves and do their best by collecting “Jewel”. Repeatedly reincarnate and aim to conquer dungeons that change their appearance each time you enter them!
